article_title: Hilton Head Hospital penalized by Medicare program
article_text: Hilton Head Hospital will lose some federal funding this year for failing to keep patients safe from preventable conditions that develop while in the hospital's care.

article_metadata.news-keywords: Hospital-acquired condition reduction, medicare, Hilton Head Hospital, Beaufort Memorial, Kurt Gambla, Shawna Doran, Coastal Carolina, hospitals, complications, urinary tract infections, quality, penalty, finding, FY 2014
